title: BFlix
description: is an application made as a technical assignment as part of a job application as Frontend Developer with Abn Amro N.V.. This is the original version made with: React, React-RouterDom, Axios and regular CSS. I'm proud of the flexibility of the components

title: MixB!
description: is a cocktail recipe database, developed using the framework React, styled with CSS modules and navigation is possible by React-Router-Dom.  The recipes are retrieved via GET request using Axios from the CocktailDb API and the inlog- and accountpage works by React-Hook-Form.

title: Portfolio Bart
description: is where the projects made by this young developer can easily be found. Made in React, styled with Tailwind CSS and navigation is handled by React-Router-Dom. The contact form is handled by MailJS as this is a purely frontend application.
